summary: Email correspondence between a prosecutor and a financial investigator regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's financial accounts, including credit cards, UBS accounts, and FBAR filings. The email discusses subpoenas to UBS and UMB Bank and requests information about Maxwell's active financial accounts and suspicious activity reports.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: Addressed in an email regarding follow-up on Ghislaine Maxwell's financial information, likely involved in the investigation of her accounts.

persons.name: Moe
persons.context: Author of an email requesting follow-up on Ghislaine Maxwell's financial accounts, including credit cards, UBS accounts, and SAR/CTR checks, and confirming subpoena issuance.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual whose financial accounts, including credit cards, UBS accounts, and FBAR filings, are being investigated and discussed in the correspondence.

connections.description: Moe, as an Assistant United States Attorney, is investigating Ghislaine Maxwell's financial accounts and activities.
Mandy is involved in providing or discussing financial information related to Ghislaine Maxwell's accounts.

events.title: Subpoena Issued to UBS
events.description: A subpoena was issued to UBS regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's accounts.

events.title: Scheduled Follow-up Call
events.description: A call was scheduled for Monday morning to discuss Ghislaine Maxwell's financial accounts and subpoena responses.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell had financial accounts at UBS, Barclays, and Carter Allen Private Bank, with FBARs filed for the last four years.
A subpoena was issued to UBS on September 25, 2019, regarding Maxwell's accounts, and the SDNY did not have the returns as of June 2020.
The investigation included reviewing Maxwell's credit cards, AMEX statements, and a connection to UMB Bank for auto-pay services.
The correspondence indicates an active financial investigation into Maxwell's assets and transactions, including checks for SAR/CTR filings.
